defs: the state of being possessed by the excessive desire for sexual intercourse.

acting on one's will, often irrationally.

ಕಾರಪರ್ಬ kāraparba = ಕಾರಹಬ್ಬ; ಕಾರಪುಣ್ನಮಿ kārapuṇnami = ಕಾರಹುಣ್ಣಿಮೆ; ಕಾರಪುಣಮೆ kārapuṇame = ಕಾರಹುಣ್ಣಿಮೆ; ಕಾರಹಬ್ಬ kārahabba a festival observed on the full moon-day in the the third month of Hindu calendar; i.e.during rainy season, ಕಾರಹುಣ್ಣಿಮೆ kāra huṇṇime the full moon-day in the third month of Hindu calendar; ಕಾರಹುಣ್ಣಿವೆ kāra huṇṇive = ಕಾರಹುಣ್ಣಿಮೆ.
